long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple notepad for your browser.
Take notes directly in browser tab.
Take notes from web pages.

Shortcut : Ctrl + . (dot)
Supported features
- Add notes
- Make notes favorite and take notes from any sites. (right click & send to TabNotes++)
- Hide notes
- Remove notes
- Download notes in text or html format
- Import/Export session
